original_text: Then Jacob made a promise to God. He said, ‘While I am on this journey, I want God to be with me and to take care of me. I want him to give me food to eat and clothes to wear.
korean_text: 야곱이 서원하여 이르되 하나님이 나와 함께 계셔서 내가 가는 이 길에서 나를 지키시고 먹을 떡과 입을 옷을 주시어

sentences.original_text: Then Jacob made a promise to God.
While I am on this journey,
I want God to be with me
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 하나님이 나와 함께 있기를 원합니다

sentences.original_text: and to take care of me.
I want him to give me food to eat
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 그가 먹을 음식을 주기를 원합니다
